**FAQ’s:**

_Can these servers be customised?_
Yes, we have several options during the checkout process for eligible systems. Pre-configured servers cannot be customised. If you seek a different configuration than listed please contact us.

_Can I check your network?_
Yes, our LookingGlass can be found at [https://as62240.net/](https://as62240.net/info).

_How long for deployment?_
Our standard delivery is within 5 working days due to the current situation around the world. Our average provisioning time is within 1 working day. Custom configurations may take longer.

_Do you offer IPMI Access?_
Yes, free VPN Secured IPMI access can be provided on request.

_Do you offer IPv6?_
Yes, /64 or /48 subnets can be requested during the order process.

_Can you accommodate x, y or z?_
Open a sales ticket to discuss our custom solutions, happy to help where possible.

_Any questions or queries?_
Contact our team today at [https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/)

All prices are exclusive of VAT where applicable. Stock is limited and the offers are valid subject to stock remaining. Because of the limited stock, if the order is not paid within an hour, it will be regretfully cancelled and the stock returned to the pool for others to enjoy. Subject to our standard [Terms & Conditions](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/terms-conditions). Cancellation notice period applies.
